      • getPlayerMessage

        public String getPlayerMessage(UUID uuid,
                               String key)
        Gets the localized message for the specified player or the default if the localized message doesnt exist in that locale This is the main method that should be used to retrieve messages
        Parameters:
        uuid - Player's UUID to check for
        key - The key to the message to retrieve
        Returns:
        The localized message in the locale the player currently has selected
